directions: Prep:10min › Cook:1hr › Extra time:20min marinating › Ready in:1hr30min
Mix together the ginger, green chillies and mint leaves. Blend them together in a food processor.
Add the paste to the lamb. Add the yoghurt as well and mix them well. Keep the marinated lamb aside for 15-20 minutes.
Heat oil in the pan. Add the bay leaves and the cardamoms to the hot oil.
Then add the marinated lamb. Add the cumin and the turmeric powder. Stir the lamb for 4 – 5 minutes at medium heat.
Now add the chopped spinach to the lamb, the quartered tomatoes and salt to taste, and let it cook on slow heat.
Add a small amount of water to prevent the meat and the spinach from sticking in the pan. When the meat starts falling off the bone, you know the lamb is cooked.
Lovely aromatic lamb with spinach is ready to be served.
Saag Gosht is nice as a medium dry dish, do not make this dish runny.
Serve the dish with white rice or paratha.
ingredients: 1kg lamb shoulder (preferred lamb on the bone)
title: Aromatic Lamb and Spinach curry
